<td align="left" valign="top" class="maintitle"><strong>SHLN Personal Development Planning &amp
The following materials are used to facilitate PDP in an employability context. All students in the department take Level 1 &
column2: 2 Professional Development and Placement modules. Personal Development Planning is embedded within these modules. Materials are housed within the students' Progress File alongside other reflective and action planning tasks which focus more on academic and personal development.
